name: Play Go with friends (VR)
description:
Welcome!

This is a Go game you can play with a friend. It can also play with the non-VR version (separate free download).

Three ways to play

1. Hotseat with keyboard + mouse on a single computer.

2. Over the internet with a friend, each on their computer (keyboard + mouse).

3. Over the internet with a friend, one or both playing in VR.

Download the free non-VR version for your friends to play with you!
